# Visualizing trends {#visualizing-trends}


```{r}
library(MASS)
ggplot(Cars93, aes(x = Price, y = Fuel.tank.capacity)) + geom_point() + geom_smooth(se = FALSE) +
  geom_smooth(se = FALSE, method = "gam", formula = y ~ s(x, k = 3), color = "red") +
  geom_smooth(se = FALSE, method = "gam", formula = y ~ s(x, k = 10), color = "green") +
  geom_smooth(se = FALSE, method = "nls", formula = y ~ param1*x/(x+param2) + param3, color = "purple")

# See also: https://altaf-ali.github.io/ggplot_tutorial/smoother.html
```
